abstract: Margaret Pomeranz and David Stratton have differing opinions on the 1992 film, 'Romper Stomper'.
description: Despite their shared passion for film, Margaret Pomeranz and David Stratton often disagreed wildly on the films they reviewed on their program, 'The Movie Show'. A notable case in point is their review of Geoffrey Wright's film, ‘Romper Stomper’, where they have two very different readings of the theme of racism in Australia.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002425; Margaret and David: 25 Years Talking Movies Highlights; Active; 2011
